attributes.action: Stop nurserys charging fees for bank holidays and when they choose to close.
attributes.additional_details:
I have researched and a lot of nirserys charge parents when they state they are closed! Surely this shouldn't be happening. 

Nursery is closed for a holiday, we shouldn't have to pay.
attributes.background: I have had enough of child-minders & nursery’s been allowed to charge us when they are closed or on holidays. Childcare costs enough as it is without us having to be charged full price when childcare places don’t even have our children.
